item.title: Implementing silent refresh of JWT
item.description: Prerequisite knowledge When you are building services for everyone to access online, you need have a way protect resources so that only the user can access data belonging to them only. For this, websites implement login/ signup, enter username and password and voila access granted! This process is called “Authentication”. But what happens when you close your browser or refresh the website. Do you re-login with username and password? No, right.
